title: Miscellaneous Prose Works of Sir Walter Scott, Bart
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: This important marriage was celebrated withgreat pomp. The Earl of Surrey, a gaUant English nobleman, had the charge to conduct the Princess Margaret to her new kingdom of Scotland,The Kuig came to meet her at Newbattle Abbey,within six mUes of Edinburgh. He was gallantlydressed in a jacket of crimson velvet, bordered withcloth of gold, aud had hanging at his back his lure,as it is called, an implement which is used in hawking.
